original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples, ‘Many people are ready to believe God's message. They are like crops in the fields at harvest time. But there are very few workers to bring in the crops.
korean_text: 이에 제자들에게 이르시되 추수할 것은 많되 일꾼이 적으니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples
Many people are ready to believe God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 하나님의 메시지를 믿을 준비가 되어있다

sentences.original_text: They are like crops in the fields at harvest time
But there are very few workers
